channel.title: Slimmed Down GitHub YAML Updates
channel.description: A feed of updated YAML files from GitHub

item.title: Week 39: Updated Rules
item.description:
Updated rules this week:
Name: Authentication Methods Changed for Privileged Account (Version: 1.1.1)
ID: 694c91ee-d606-4ba9-928e-405a2dd0ff0f

Name: ADFS DKM Master Key Export (Version: 1.2.1)
ID: 18e6a87e-9d06-4a4e-8b59-3469cd49552d

Name: Audit policy manipulation using auditpol utility (Version: 1.2.3)
ID: 66276b14-32c5-4226-88e3-080dacc31ce1

Name: Brute force attack against Azure Portal (Version: 2.1.4)
ID: 28b42356-45af-40a6-a0b4-a554cdfd5d8a

Name: Multiple Sources Affected by the Same TI Destination (Version: 1.1.3)
ID: 4644baf7-3464-45dd-bd9d-e07687e25f81

Name: Port Scan (Version: 1.1.2)
ID: b2c5907b-1040-4692-9802-9946031017e8

ID: 32ffb19e-8ed8-40ed-87a0-1adb4746b7c4

Name: Port Sweep (Version: 1.2.2)
ID: 720335f4-ee8c-4270-9424-d0859222168c

ID: 3fe3c520-04f1-44b8-8398-782ed21435f8

ID: bfb1c90f-8006-4325-98be-c7fffbc254d6

ID: 12dcea64-bec2-41c9-9df2-9f28461b1295

ID: ae10c588-7ff7-486c-9920-ab8b0bdb6ede

ID: aa1eff90-29d4-49dc-a3ea-b65199f516db
